extendedInfo.description: This toggles on and off the 4G radio on the Samsung CHARGE.  All you have to do it touch the application icon and you will switch your active network between CDMA and LTE.  You can also select launch "LTE Choose" to manually choose the launcher... Click "LTE Choose" then select "System selection"* Has NOT been tested on any other 4G phones* Screenshot demonstrates screen within the settings window of the phone to verify switch between 4G and 3G.  This application has NO user interface.

reviews.title: Wth?
reviews.comment: It won\'t open!  Says it can\'t find app on phone to open. WTF??? 1.00 wasted.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent.
reviews.comment: Works fantastically. Long press your screen and create a shortcut to the toggle app and presto! One click toggling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hey!
reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Froyo only
reviews.comment: This app worked well when I was running Froyo, but updated to the latest leak, it will only work from 3G to 4G. Going the other way does nothing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: simply works
reviews.comment: works perfectly on rooted Charge with Gummy Charged ROM. Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: As ADVERTISED
reviews.comment: Paired with PhoneWeaver and created lowbattery profile, toggles 3g/4g perfectly A+
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No way to contact dev?
reviews.comment: I have a VZW Stratosphere, SCH-I405.  Uses same method as Charge to toggle LTE. Wanted to use this app for a quick one-touch toggle, but since it tries to do a phone check first it fails. Wanted to contact dev to ask him/her to add Stratosphere to the list, but website link fails and no e-mail given.  I returned the app, but would re-buy if the dev can tweak it to allow the Stratosphere.  The \"manual\" process supplied by the app works fine, but the single-touch shortcut fails due to device check.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works as described, unfortunately Droid Charge\'s modem is still flaky. Not dev\'s fault. Would love to see an on/off widget with current status.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: Works as advertised. Make sure you choose \"LTE toggle\" not \"LTE choose \" from the amo drawer after install.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Happy
reviews.comment: So far seems to be doing the job as stated was looking for a while for a program to do this.well worth it for the money A+++
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work with latest radio just sits on 4g.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Looking for 3g-4g switch? This isn\'t it...free apps do the total shut off too...rip off...shuts off everything...did not switch to 3g as advertised
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: great does wat it says :)

reviews.comment: Works perfect

reviews.comment: Does what it says and is the only app that does for the Charge right now. Make sure to choose LTEToggle because it comes with two apps.

reviews.title: Toggle
reviews.comment: Not a real toggle but does the job on my charge
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not a widget, its an app but it works great ...would love a widget that indicated whether 4g was activated or not
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to work
reviews.comment: Used to work on 2.2.1, updated to 2.3.6 now doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does what it says. Droid Charge.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great!
